mapper.select: SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_id, ceo_name, ceo_store, ceo_main_menu, ceo_detail_menu1, ceo_menu_img1, ceo_open_time,ceo_city_address, ceo_full_address, ceo_call_number, ceo_contents, ceo_category, ceo_thumbnail_img, ceo_main_img, ceo_score, ceo_lat, ceo_lon, ceo_grade FROM ceo_tp WHERE ceo_idx = #{ceoIdx}
SELECT customer_idx, customer_id, customer_name, customer_nick, customer_gender, customer_age, customer_follow FROM customer_tp WHERE customer_idx = #{customerIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_tp SET customer_follow = concat(customer_follow, #{ceoStore}, ",") WHERE customer_idx = #{customerIdx}
UPDATE customer_tp SET customer_follow = REPLACE(customer_follow, CONCAT(#{ceoStore}, ','), '') WHERE customer_idx = #{customerIdx}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS follows_cnt FROM customer_tp WHERE customer_follow LIKE
concat('%',#{ceoStore},'%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_tp WHERE ceo_idx = #{ceoIdx} AND review_delete = 'N'

SELECT R.review_idx, R.customer_idx, R.customer_nick, R.ceo_idx, R.review_title, R.review_contents, R.review_img, R.review_date, R.review_score, R.review_delete, RT.review_tag_idx, RT.review_tag1, RT.review_tag2, RT.review_tag3, RT.review_tag4, RT.review_tag5, RT.review_tag6, RT.review_tag7, RT.review_tag8 FROM review_tp R JOIN review_tag_tp RT ON(R.review_idx = RT.review_idx) WHERE ceo_idx = #{ceoIdx} AND review_delete = 'N' ORDER BY review_idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE review_tp SET review_delete = 'Y' WHERE review_idx = #{reviewIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT COM.comment_idx, COM.review_idx, COM.ceo_idx, COM.customer_idx, COM.comment_contents, COM.comment_date, CUS.customer_nick FROM comment_tp COM JOIN customer_tp CUS ON (COM.customer_idx = CUS.customer_idx) WHERE ceo_idx = #{ceoIdx} AND comment_delete = 'N' ORDER BY comment_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_tp (review_idx, ceo_idx, customer_idx, comment_contents, comment_date) VALUES (#{reviewIdx}, #{ceoIdx}, #{customerIdx}, #{commentContents}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT question_idx, customer_idx, customer_nick, ceo_idx, question_complete, question_title, question_contents, question_date, answer_contents, answer_date FROM question_tp WHERE ceo_idx = #{ceoIdx} ORDER BY question_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_tp (customer_idx, customer_nick, ceo_idx, question_title, question_contents, question_date) VALUES (#{customerIdx}, #{customerNick}, #{ceoIdx}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContents}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE question_tp SET answer_contents = #{answerContents}, answer_date = NOW(), question_complete = '답변완료' WHERE question_idx = #{questionIdx}
